column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////HI Star - Thank you for the great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our vegetarian options at JINYA. In the near future
column2: we plan to open two more locations in Houston
column3: which hopefully will alleviate some of the crowds. And I agree that loud music isn't for everyone
column4: and I'm the type that enjoys dinner over soft music; however
column5: JINYA's concept is geared more towards the trendy and exuberant atmosphere.
